class.name: GeoJsonDriver
class.documentation: This output driver produces output in the GeoJson format. See also the parameters for the BaseDriver.

parameter.name: geojson_zip
parameter.documentation: Defines if output files will be zipped.

parameter.name: geojson_author
parameter.documentation: Gives the author of the product.

parameter.name: geojson_link
parameter.documentation: Gives the HTTP link to the product (Example: http://www.ecmwf.int/products).

parameter.name: geojson_coastlines
parameter.documentation: Determines if coastlines are written by Magics or not. Default is OFF because GIS systems have often their own coastlines.
